trends: There has been one other sighting in Cascade Locks
There were no other sightings in Cascade Locks on or around February 19th 2013
Summary: 5 pulsating red objects hovering and flying over the Columbia river
divs: Sighting DetailsWe receieved a call from our son in law who was in town. He told us to go outside and look up. we ran to the backyard and coming toward us were 5 objects at a very low elevation moving slowly up and then back down and then they were merging together. 3 of the 5 objects went straight up and into cloud cover where 2 were left behind moving from right to left to up and down until they just disappeared after approx 10 minutes.
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
